actions.name: attach_file
actions.description: Upload and attach a file to an item/task/comment.

actions.name: create_comment
actions.description: Post a comment on an item or task.

actions.name: create_item
actions.description: Create a new record in a Podio app with specified field values.

actions.name: create_status
actions.description: Add a status to an item or workspace stream.

actions.name: create_task
actions.description: Add a new task to an item or workspace with due dates, assignees, and attachments.

actions.name: find_item
actions.description: Retrieve a single item by ID or field value.

actions.name: find_task
actions.description: Retrieve a task by ID for further updates.

actions.name: update_item
actions.description: Update an existing record in a Podio app with specified field values. Only provided fields will be updated.

triggers.name: item_updated
triggers.description: Fires when an existing item is updated (excluding comments)

triggers.name: new_activity
triggers.description: Fires when a new status is created in a workspace stream

triggers.name: new_item
triggers.description: Fires when a new item (record/entry) is created in an app

triggers.name: new_app
triggers.description: Fires when a new app is created in a workspace

triggers.name: new_task
triggers.description: Fires when a new task is added to any workspace

triggers.name: member_added
triggers.description: Fires when a new member is added to a workspace
